articles.author: Sean Ingle
articles.title: Middlesex chairman condemned for ‘outdated’ views at racism hearing - The Guardian
articles.description: English cricket has come under fresh criticism after Middlesex chairman Mike O’Farrell told parliament black players prefer football and rugby and the Asian community prioritise education
articles.content:
Middlesex CCC chairman criticised for his remarks on lack of diversity video Cricket

articles.title: Champions Japan advance to quarters with win over Vietnam - Reuters
articles.description: Defending champions Japan beat Vietnam 3-0 at the Women's Asian Cup in Pune on Monday to book their place in the quarter-finals alongside Australia and South Korea.
articles.content:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Defending champions Japan beat Vietnam 3-0 at the Women's Asian Cup in Pune on Monday to book their place in the quarter-finals alongside Australia and South Korea.

articles.title: Motorcycle bursts into flames along Mandai Ave, rider taken to hospital - AsiaOne
